title: notblox1
author: notblox1
created_time: April 15, 2023, 04:55:50 PMLast edit: December 01, 2024, 12:40:43 PM by notblox1
content: I started my service for making logos for all BSFL competition participants, and for everyone else who wants to have unique logo.You can post if you want to receive your own logo and we can continue communicating with messages for more details about design.Here are few Logo examples I made for BSFL members:                                  Q&A:How much you charge for creating logos? There is no fixed rate, depending on logo complexity, but early BSFL players will have special discounts.How fast will you make? It will take few days or weeks, I want you to be happy with your logo.What information you need for making my logo?1. Choose your two main logo colors.2. Choose optional additional text YES or NO (united, city, anything...)3. Your favorite sport club?4. Your favorite logo design and shape?5. Your favorite national team or country?Who owns logo you will make for me? You own all the rights and you can use it anywhere you want.Can other members ask for logo if they didnt join BSFL league? Yes, but price will be higher for them.Can other members ask for logo if they didnt join BSFL league? Yes, but price will be higher for them.Can I create NFT from my logo? You can do anything you want with it.What is BSFL? Sportsbet's Bitcointalk Sports Fanatics League (BSFL): https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5438071.0Completed logos:BSFL league ✅BSFL divisions ✅Trofo ✅Cryptofrka ✅Notblox1 ✅slaman29 ✅slackovic ✅Ulven ✅igebotz ✅buwaytress ✅LFC_Bitcoin ✅Harkorede ✅entebah ✅

comments.author: slackovic
comments.body: Wow! This is great! What information do you need to create my logo for the BSFL competition?

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: slackovic on April 15, 2023, 06:44:37 PMWow! This is great! What information do you need to create my logo for the BSFL competition?Basic things I need from you is two main colors you can choose for your logo, optional extra name you want to add, something like Slackovic United, Slackovic City, or anything else.Than you can add additional information, your favorite sport, your favorite club, and anything else that could make design unique.I will include your profile ID number and add additional graphics based on feedback I receive from you.

comments.author: entebah
comments.body: I just wondering how much it cost for the logos with my name in it and the color is red and white?if possible can you add a fancy font for the logos? btw I joined the BSFL and I'm in division 3.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: entebah on April 16, 2023, 06:33:55 PMI just wondering how much it cost for the logos with my name in it and the color is red and white?if possible can you add a fancy font for the logos? btw I joined the BSFL and I'm in division 3. Price will be very acceptable for basic logo design with fancy font, since you already joined BSFL league.I will put you on my reservation list and I will contact you with messages and ask for more information about logo.What name you want to be written on logo?  Just entebah or something additional like entebah united?

comments.author: entebah
comments.body: Quote from: notblox1 on April 16, 2023, 07:17:18 PMQuote from: entebah on April 16, 2023, 06:33:55 PMI just wondering how much it cost for the logos with my name in it and the color is red and white?if possible can you add a fancy font for the logos? btw I joined the BSFL and I'm in division 3. Price will be very acceptable for basic logo design with fancy font, since you already joined BSFL league.I will put you on my reservation list and I will contact you with messages and ask for more information about logo.What name you want to be written on logo?  Just entebah or something additional like entebah united?is it possible to do both? because I want to use the entebah united for BSFL and the entebah only I will use it on other websites. like Twitter and other forums that I currently use.

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: I have not decided what my logo is likely to look like...Do you have any templates we could use to get this logo designed?

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: entebah on April 16, 2023, 08:31:56 PMis it possible to do both? because I want to use the entebah united for BSFL and the entebah only I will use it on other websites. like Twitter and other forums that I currently use.It is possible and I can make both versions for you.You are added on my waiting list and I will contact you when I get more details from Cro2 team that are working on BSFL league organization.Quote from: Woodie on April 16, 2023, 11:20:30 PMDo you have any templates we could use to get this logo designed?No, every logo will be unique and I am not using any templates and logo generators.Think about it, price will be symbolic for early BSFL members and you will see how my logo looks first when I finish and release it.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: I was inspired and I had some free time in last few days so I created first logo for BSFL league and I decided this to be logo for one of our founding fathers Trofo.  This should fit him perfectly and any similarity with Italian car brand with a snake in logo was intentional.Small corrections are possible but nothing with major changes, because I like how it looks and it works well in all sizes.  BSFL logo making service is now open for new applications and you can contact me for more details.

comments.author: Trofo
comments.body: Quote from: notblox1 on September 14, 2023, 09:43:20 AMI was inspired and I had some free time in last few days so I created first logo for BSFL league and I decided this to be logo for one of our founding fathers Trofo.  This should fit him perfectly and any similarity with Italian car brand with a snake in logo was intentional.Small corrections are possible but nothing with major changes, because I like how it looks and it works well in all sizes.  BSFL logo making service is now open for new applications and you can contact me for more details.I like the logo, good work.Now when you called me a snake and even incorporated it into my logo design I feel compelled to include as much as possible eSports and snooker into future questions   Especially when we meet again

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: Trofo on September 14, 2023, 10:52:21 AMNow when you called me a snake and even incorporated it into my logo design I feel compelled to include as much as possible eSports and snooker into future questions   Especially when we meet again I am glad you like logo I made, but I didnt expect any special attention from you for BSFL  Few more logos are being made right now and I will release them soon when they are finished.I hope that we can slowly start adding this logos in spreadsheets and in forum table standings.It would be great f you could help me adding this.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: As promised I made another logo for new BSFL season, and this time it was for Cryptofrka, another BSFL founding member from Cro2 team.Our community likes to call him Mafia or Mafiaman, and I had many more nicknames like Al Cryptofrka or Al Cryprfkone, so with this new logo he was a granted special license to compete in Italian Mafia Seria A competition!        I finished another logo that was ordered by member Ulven but he is not responding to my messages for final confirmation.Everyone should get one logo for new season, so dont wait an contact me as soon as possible

comments.author: cryptofrka
comments.body: Didn't realize there's a topic for this. I love mine, I will do some nasty tricks at the green table wearing it.I hope we'll be able to incorporate them into the BSFL, we need some tips from joker_josue on how to do it though.

comments.author: Igebotz
comments.body: Quote from: cryptofrka on October 08, 2023, 04:19:38 PMDidn't realize there's a topic for this. I love mine, I will do some nasty tricks at the green table wearing it.I hope we'll be able to incorporate them into the BSFL, we need some tips from joker_josue on how to do it though.Ulven implemented similar thing for the FPL fantasy https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5406159.2060 unfortunately he got banned for ban evasion, we gotta miss that beautiful table of his until maybe someone pick it up. I'm trusting joker_josue to give us a bad ass template to make the logos more visible. Thanks for all you do man! Notblox1 your service needs me, I don't need your service. ( in Abramovic's voice) lol. I need something dope for the new season, you know what fits a bad cop like me don't you? I will provide you with my details in PM.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: cryptofrka on October 08, 2023, 04:19:38 PMDidn't realize there's a topic for this. I love mine, I will do some nasty tricks at the green table wearing it.I can make quick generic logos with names for everyone else who is so stingy miser person that dont want to pay me anything for more professional unique design.BSFL league and BSFL Cup also deserve to have good logos, so that is coming very soon before next season starts.I should have special title after this, as official BSFL designer  Quote from: Igebotz on October 08, 2023, 11:01:10 PMUlven implemented similar thing for the FPL fantasy https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5406159.2060 unfortunately he got banned for ban evasion, we gotta miss that beautiful table of his until maybe someone pick it up.I didnt know he was banned.That explains why he is not responding to my messages, and why he owes me money.His logo is very cool, but I guess he is not going to compete in Division 2 next season.Does anyone know how to contact Ulven outside forum?Quote from: cryptofrka on October 08, 2023, 04:19:38 PMI need something dope for the new season, you know what fits a bad cop like me don't you? I will provide you with my details in PM. We can make something happen, and I think it will annoy Cro2 team members whenever they see your logo.I hope you are not stingy, so send me PM and get in line to experience greatness  slackovic and entebah are on my reserve list.Should we continue with new logos guys?

comments.author: cryptofrka
comments.body: Quote from: Igebotz on October 08, 2023, 11:01:10 PMUlven implemented similar thing for the FPL fantasy https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5406159.2060 unfortunately he got banned for ban evasion, we gotta miss that beautiful table of his until maybe someone pick it up. I'm trusting joker_josue to give us a bad ass template to make the logos more visible. Thanks for all you do man! Ulven is online today - hopefully his ban is gone. Or he can read the forum but can't post?I'd also like to hear more from joker_josue on how to implement this. Trofo was working with him on our BSFL league tables so I'm sure they'll be able to work something out.

Trofo was working with him on our BSFL league tables so I'm sure they'll be able to work something out.He's only on a read mode he can't post and he's ban is still active. @onblox1 you misquoted Cryptofka - that was my quote and not his and as for Ulven you can look up for his telegram handle on one of those alts -thread he got reported on.

comments.author: Trofo
comments.body: Quote from: cryptofrka on October 09, 2023, 12:21:45 PMQuote from: Igebotz on October 08, 2023, 11:01:10 PMUlven implemented similar thing for the FPL fantasy https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5406159.2060 unfortunately he got banned for ban evasion, we gotta miss that beautiful table of his until maybe someone pick it up. I'm trusting joker_josue to give us a bad ass template to make the logos more visible. Thanks for all you do man! Ulven is online today - hopefully his ban is gone. Or he can read the forum but can't post?I'd also like to hear more from joker_josue on how to implement this. Trofo was working with him on our BSFL league tables so I'm sure they'll be able to work something out.I don't see a way to properly integrate logos in our tables. There simply isn't space. I mean check those tables from ulven and check how my logo looks there. I can't see anything, and logo or no logo makes no difference in those conditions. On the other hand we have 4 tables in BSFL and we can't really make them much bigger.Maybe there is some sweet spot to hit and maybe someone like joker_josue can do it but I don't see how. Another solution is too make super simple logos but then again you are loosing a lot of design options.

comments.author: Igebotz
comments.body: Quote from: Trofo on October 09, 2023, 12:35:06 PMQuote from: cryptofrka on October 09, 2023, 12:21:45 PMQuote from: Igebotz on October 08, 2023, 11:01:10 PMUlven implemented similar thing for the FPL fantasy https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5406159.2060 unfortunately he got banned for ban evasion, we gotta miss that beautiful table of his until maybe someone pick it up. Or he can read the forum but can't post?I'd also like to hear more from joker_josue on how to implement this. Trofo was working with him on our BSFL league tables so I'm sure they'll be able to work something out.I don't see a way to properly integrate logos in our tables. There simply isn't space. I mean check those tables from ulven and check how my logo looks there. I can't see anything, and logo or no logo makes no difference in those conditions. On the other hand we have 4 tables in BSFL and we can't really make them much bigger.Maybe there is some sweet spot to hit and maybe someone like joker_josue can do it but I don't see how. Another solution is too make super simple logos but then again you are loosing a lot of design options.The Ulven style is exactly what we want; the logos aren't large enough, but they are really lovely and appear better than the current BSFL table setup. We're only fewer than 17 in each of our divisions, so we can make it bigger than what we have now in the FPL thread.
